location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch map showing areas reconnoitred during the Gilgit Flight in October 1935

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; red ink and coloured crayon on tracing paperDimensions: 270 x 290mm

mods.abstract: The map illustrates the river valleys reconnoitred around Gilgit by a flight of Royal Air Force planes in October 1935. The areas reconnoitred are highlighted by orange dashes within a green box.The scale is 16 miles to 1 inch.
